actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

official_title: Designating the main hearing room of the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure as the "Chairman Don Young Hearing Room".
subjects: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

summary.text: This resolution designates the main hearing room of the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure as the Chairman Don Young Hearing Room and directs the Architect of the Capitol to place an engraved plaque indicating the new name over each of the doorways leading from the public hallway to the hearing room.

titles.title: Designating the main hearing room of the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure as the "Chairman Don Young Hearing Room".
Designating the main hearing room of the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure as the "Chairman Don Young Hearing Room".
